snippet: Tips on how to save notes and highlights from Kindle ebooks on Amazon.com’s website; and how to safely clean a flat-panel HDTV LCD screen.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on how to save notes and highlights from Kindle ebooks on Amazon.com’s website, and how to safely clean a flat-panel HDTV LCD screen; Tip of the Week notes notification feature built into iOS can keep user updated with alerts from favorite apps and news sites.
lead_paragraph: Tips on how to save notes and highlights from Kindle ebooks on Amazon.com’s website; and how to safely clean a flat-panel HDTV LCD screen.

headline.main: Saving Kindle Notes Online, and Cleaning an LCD Screen
headline.print_headline: Saving Kindle Notes Online, and Cleaning an LCD Screen
